title: Ocean View
description: Enjoy the breathtaking view of the ocean from your window. Perfect for a peaceful and budget-friendly getaway.

title: Sunset Suite
description: Experience luxury and style with a stunning view of the sunset. Ideal for solo travelers looking for comfort.

title: Beachfront Bliss
description: Relax in this comfortable beachfront room, designed for families or friends to enjoy a tropical escape.

title: Coastal Retreat
description: A quiet and cozy room near the coast. Offers great value and a restful environment close to the beach.

title: Seaside Heaven
description: Indulge in comfort and elegance by the sea. This luxury suite is designed for unforgettable coastal stays.

title: Tropical Paradise
description: Immerse yourself in tropical beauty with this well-equipped room. Great for couples or small families.
